      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addCustomer(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String lName, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String email)
      Preconditions:
      No customer with an exactly matching fName and lName may exist in this instance
      One of either phone or email must not be null
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:
      A customer record with the matching fields will be added to this instance
      By default this customer prefers any contact channel provided, but not print.
      Task addNewTask(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String location)
      Preconditions:
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a ToDo module via SPFEAFacade.setToDoProvider
      Postconditions:
      The given task details will be stored in the application and retrievable by task lookup methods with matching criteria
      void completeTask(int id)
      Preconditions:
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a ToDo module via SPFEAFacade.setToDoProvider
      The id must have a corresponding incomplete task stored in the service provider
      Postconditions:
      The task with the matching ID will be marked as completed
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllCustomers()
      Preconditions:
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:

      boolean login(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Preconditions:
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      The SPFEAFacade must not be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:
      SPFEA will be in a logged in state until its Auth provider is changed or logout() is called.
      void logout()
      Preconditions:
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:
      SPFEA will no longer be in a logged-in state
      int placeOrder(int customerID, int qty)
      Preconditions:
      A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      The SPFEAFacade must have a corresponding service provider for any channel preference the given customer has set (via setCustomerPreferences) Postconditions:
      An order will be recorded for this customer.
      void removeCustomer(int id)
      Preconditions:
      A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:
      No customer with a matching id will exist in this instance
      void setAuthProvider(AuthModule provider)
      Preconditions:

      Postconditions:
      All method calls requiring this service will be passed to the given provider until this method is invoked again.
      If this method is invoked with a null parameter (a legal operation) all such calls will fail.
      This method will set SPFEA to a logged-out state regardless of any prior Auth state
      void setCustomerEmail(int id, java.lang.String email)
      Preconditions:
      A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
      If email is null, matching customer must have a non-null phone field set
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:
      The matching customer’s email field will be updated to match the email parameter
      void setCustomerPhone(int id, java.lang.String phone)
      Preconditions:
      A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
      If phone is null, matching customer must have a non-null email field set
      The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
      SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
      Postconditions:
      The matching customer’s phone field will be updated to match the phone parameter

      • addNewTask

        public Task addNewTask(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.String location)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a ToDo module via SPFEAFacade.setToDoProvider
        Postconditions:
        The given task details will be stored in the application and retrievable by task lookup methods with matching criteria
        Specified by:
        addNewTask in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        dateTime - may not be null, must be a value greater than or equal to LocalDateTime.now()
        description - may not be null or empty
        location - must be one of: "HOME OFFICE", "CUSTOMER SITE", or "MOBILE"
        Returns:
        The (not completed) Task with matching fields created by this method call
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - any of the parameter preconditions are breached
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null ToDo provider set

      • completeTask

        public void completeTask(int id)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                         java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a ToDo module via SPFEAFacade.setToDoProvider
        The id must have a corresponding incomplete task stored in the service provider
        Postconditions:
        The task with the matching ID will be marked as completed
        Specified by:
        completeTask in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        id - The target task id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no matching task exists
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null ToDo provider set, or if the matching task has already been completed

      • getAllTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> getAllTasks()
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a ToDo module via SPFEAFacade.setToDoProvider
        Postconditions:

        Specified by:
        getAllTasks in interface SPFEAFacade
        Returns:
        A complete list of all tasks which have been added to and not removed from the current instance of the service provider. May not be null, may be empty Changes to this list itself will not be reflected in the SPFEAFacade, but changes to the Tasks it contains will be
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null ToDo provider set

      • addCustomer

        public int addCustomer(java.lang.String fName,
                       java.lang.String lName,
                       java.lang.String phone,
                       java.lang.String email)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       java.lang.SecurityException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        No customer with an exactly matching fName and lName may exist in this instance
        One of either phone or email must not be null
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
        SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
        Postconditions:
        A customer record with the matching fields will be added to this instance
        By default this customer prefers any contact channel provided, but not print.
        Specified by:
        addCustomer in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        fName - may not be null or empty
        lName - may not be null or empty
        phone - may be null, may not be empty, may only contain numeric characters and ‘+()’ if not null
        email - may be null, may not be empty, must contain at least one @ character if not null
        Returns:
        The id of the new customer record added to this instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are violated
        java.lang.SecurityException - if SPFEA is not logged in or the logged in user cannot be authenticated
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null Auth provider set

      • setCustomerPreferences

        public void setCustomerPreferences(int customerID,
                                   boolean email,
                                   boolean print,
                                   boolean fax)
                            throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
        At least one preference must be set. The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
        SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
        Postconditions:
        An invoice will be created for all true preference parameter channels for all subsequent orders
        Specified by:
        setCustomerPreferences in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        customerID - The target customer id
        email - Send an email invoice when this customer places an order
        print - Send a printed invoice when this customer places an order
        fax - Send an faxed invoice when this customer places an order
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if SPFEA is not logged in or the logged in user cannot be authenticated
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null Auth provider set

      • placeOrder

        public int placeOrder(int customerID,
                      int qty)
               throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                      java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
        SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
        The SPFEAFacade must have a corresponding service provider for any channel preference the given customer has set (via setCustomerPreferences) Postconditions:
        An order will be recorded for this customer. Invoices will be generated for all set customer preferences through the appropriate services.
        Specified by:
        placeOrder in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        customerID - The target customer id
        qty - The quantity of Brawndo "It's got Electrolytes!" to order. Must be greater than 0.
        Returns:
        The rounded (0.5 = 1) dollar cost of this order. Must be greater than 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if SPFEA is not logged in or the logged in user cannot be authenticated
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any required provider (Auth, invoice channels) is null

      • getTotalLifetimeCosts

        public int getTotalLifetimeCosts(int customerID)
                          throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        A customer with the matching id exists in this instance
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
        SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
        Postconditions:

        Specified by:
        getTotalLifetimeCosts in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        customerID - The target customer id
        Returns:
        The rounded (0.5 = 1) dollar cost of this customer's lifetime orders. Will return a minimum of 1 if any orders exist regardless of rounding, 0 if no orders exist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if SPFEA is not logged in or the logged in user cannot be authenticated
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any required provider (Auth, invoice channels) is null

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String userName,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
        The SPFEAFacade must not be in a logged-in state prior to this call
        Postconditions:
        SPFEA will be in a logged in state until its Auth provider is changed or logout() is called.
        Specified by:
        login in interface SPFEAFacade
        Parameters:
        userName - The username to verify. May not be null or empty.
        password - The password to verify. May not be null or empty.
        Returns:
        True if the credentials were valid, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameter preconditions are breached
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null Auth provider set, or if already in a logged-in state

      • logout

        public void logout()
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: SPFEAFacade
        Preconditions:
        The SPFEAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of an AuthModule via SPFEAFacade.setAuthProvider
        SPFEA must be in a logged-in state prior to this call
        Postconditions:
        SPFEA will no longer be in a logged-in state
        Specified by:
        logout in interface SPFEAFacade
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if called with a null Auth provider set, or if SPFEA was not already in a logged-in state
